--- title: Crew Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-10-01T18:21:12.714Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:23:15.052Z --- # Crew Info Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Tracking Crew Info:** Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_CREW_MEMBER.SEQUENCE$$` > Sequence of the Latest Retrieved Data and `XCREW.MLOG$_CREW_MEMBER.OLD_NEW$$` <> “N”. **Migrating Crew Info:** Retrieve records where `XCREW._CREW_MEMBER.EMPLOYEE_NO` >= Given `secondaryId`(see Mapping for details). #### - Source Query **Tracking Crew Info:** `Riverx_MLOG$_CREW_MEMBER_Query` **Migrating Crew Info:** `Riverx_CREW_MEMBER_Migration_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** * **Tracking Crew Info:** Every 2 minutes * **Migrating Crew Info:** Executes manually **Steps:** * **Tracking Crew Info:** Execute `Riverx_MLOG$_CREW_MEMBER_Query` query. * **Migrating Crew Info:** Execute `Riverx_CREW_MEMBER_Migration_Query` query. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `secondaryId`(see Mapping for details). * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Crew Info records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |birthCity|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`PLACE_OF_BIRTH`| | |birthCountry|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`COUNTRY_OF_BIRTH`| | |birthDay|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`BIRTH_DATE`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |bloodType| | |N/A in the source system.| |category|`XCREW.QUALIFICATION`|`RANK`|
  • when `XCREW.QUALIFICATION.RANK` <=4
    then “Cockpit” 
  • when `XCREW.QUALIFICATION.RANK` >4 and
    `XCREW.QUALIFICATION.RANK` <=8
    then “Cabin” else “Other”
| |citizenshipId| | |N/A in the source system.| |crewId|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`TLC`| | |employmentDate|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`EMPLOYMENT_BEGIN_DT`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |leaveDate|`XCREW.CREW_
